name: Lost with Dinosaurs
description: Collect power up that help you reach all placed in order to collect mushrooms.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: any with direct X DirectX: Version 9.0 Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: 2 Ghz core 2 duo Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: not integrated 2gb ram Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: any
